name: THE AFTERLiFE JUDGE
description:
You have to judge that the poor souls that come from death. What do you choose?

Controls:

Read the soul scroll to judge and decide if it goes to heaven (blue button) or hell (red button)

Left mouse button - to interact with outlined objects

Q - toggle between Main Menu / Game when game started
